main event: Mrs. Martha Johnson observed a large, silver, and round object with a golden glow over Long Island Sound.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 20 minutes.,The object was observed moving in and out of clouds.,The object appeared to hover and occasionally dart upwards and downwards.,The sighting took place from the backyard of Mrs. Johnson's residence.,There were no other witnesses or physical evidence.
sighted object: a large, silver, and round object with a golden glow
witness description: Mrs. Martha Johnson, a resident of Southold, New York
